general_advisory: Bolangir district is likely to receive very light rainfall for the upcoming 5 days with a generally cloudy sky. Maximum temperature will be between 29-33°C and minimum temperature will be between 19-25°C for the upcoming 5 days. Maximum and minimum relative humidity will be between 88-93% and 63-71% respectively. The wind speed will remain within 14 to 16 kmph for the upcoming 5 days.

advisory: The crop is at active tillering stage. Favourable conditions for Yellow stem borer infestation. Apply appropriate insecticides for management.
Chilli crop is at seedling stage. Be cautious of damping off disease due to high soil moisture. Use Mancozeb or Metalaxyl for prevention.
Brinjal is at flowering to fruiting stage. Watch out for Shoot and fruit borer infestation. Use pheromone traps and chemical controls as necessary.
